trans-unit.source: Provides a control array of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem" /> controls.
trans-unit.target: 提供 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem" /> 控件的控件数组。

trans-unit.source: The `MenuItemArray` class provides an equivalent for the run-time functionality of a Visual Basic 6.0 `MenuItem` array.
trans-unit.target: `MenuItemArray`类提供了等效的运行时功能的 Visual Basic 6.0`MenuItem`数组。

trans-unit.source: It does not provide the design-time features of a Visual Basic 6.0 control array.
trans-unit.target: 它不提供的 Visual Basic 6.0 控件数组的设计时功能。

trans-unit.source: Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic.
trans-unit.target: 函数和对象在<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6>命名空间提供用于连接通过从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 Visual Basic 的工具。

trans-unit.source: In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 大多数情况下，这些函数和对象可再现 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中其他命名空间的功能。

trans-unit.source: They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.
trans-unit.target: 只有 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 实现有显著区别时才需要这些函数和对象。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MenuItemArray" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MenuItemArray" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MenuItemArray" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MenuItemArray" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: When you instantiate a <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MenuItemArray>, you must also call the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MenuItemArray.SetIndex%2A> method to create the initial element in the array.
trans-unit.target: 当实例化<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MenuItemArray>，你还必须调用<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MenuItemArray.SetIndex%2A>方法创建的初始元素数组中。

trans-unit.source: Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic.
trans-unit.target: 函数和对象在<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6>命名空间提供用于连接通过从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 Visual Basic 的工具。

trans-unit.source: In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 大多数情况下，这些函数和对象可再现 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中其他命名空间的功能。

trans-unit.source: They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.
trans-unit.target: 只有 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 实现有显著区别时才需要这些函数和对象。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IContainer" /> where the control array will be hosted.
trans-unit.target: 将在其中承载控件数组的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IContainer" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MenuItemArray" /> class, specifying its container.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MenuItemArray" /> 类的新实例，并指定其容器。

trans-unit.source: When you instantiate a <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MenuItemArray>, you must also call the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MenuItemArray.SetIndex%2A> method to create the initial element in the array.
trans-unit.target: 当实例化<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MenuItemArray>，你还必须调用<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MenuItemArray.SetIndex%2A>方法创建的初始元素数组中。

trans-unit.source: Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic.
trans-unit.target: 函数和对象在<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6>命名空间提供用于连接通过从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 Visual Basic 的工具。

trans-unit.source: In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 大多数情况下，这些函数和对象可再现 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中其他命名空间的功能。

trans-unit.source: They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.
trans-unit.target: 只有 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 实现有显著区别时才需要这些函数和对象。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem" /> 控件。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that determines whether a control is a member of a <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MenuItemArray" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值确定控件是否是 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MenuItemArray" /> 的一个成员。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="target" /> is a member of the control array; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="target" /> 是控件数组的一个成员，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The `CanExtend` method can be used to determine whether a specific <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> control is the base element of the control array from which the other elements were cloned.
trans-unit.target: `CanExtend`方法可以用于确定是否可以使用特定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>控件是控件数组从其克隆其他元素的基本元素。

trans-unit.source: Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic.
trans-unit.target: 函数和对象在<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6>命名空间提供用于连接通过从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 Visual Basic 的工具。

trans-unit.source: In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 大多数情况下，这些函数和对象可再现 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中其他命名空间的功能。

trans-unit.source: They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.
trans-unit.target: 只有 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 实现有显著区别时才需要这些函数和对象。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem" /> in a <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MenuItemArray" /> is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 在单击 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem" /> 中的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MenuItemArray" /> 时发生。

trans-unit.source: The `Click` event passes an <xref:System.EventArgs> to its event handler.
trans-unit.target: `Click`事件传递<xref:System.EventArgs>到其事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Therefore it only indicates that a click has occurred.
trans-unit.target: 因此它仅指示发生了单击操作。

trans-unit.source: If you need more specific mouse information (button, number of clicks, wheel rotation, or location), use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseClick> event.
trans-unit.target: 如果需要更具体的鼠标信息 （按钮、 单击、 鼠标轮旋转或位置的数），使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseClick>事件。

trans-unit.source: However, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseClick> event will not be raised if the click is caused by action other than that of the mouse, such as pressing the ENTER key.
trans-unit.target: 但是，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseClick>如果单击引起操作不是鼠标，如按 ENTER 键操作，将不会引发事件。

trans-unit.source: A double-click is determined by the mouse settings of the user's operating system.
trans-unit.target: 由用户的操作系统的鼠标设置确定一次双击。

trans-unit.source: The user can set the time between clicks of a mouse button that should be considered a double-click instead of two clicks.
trans-unit.target: 用户可以设置它认为是双击而不是两次单击鼠标按钮点击之间的时间。

trans-unit.source: The `Click` event is raised every time that a control is double-clicked.
trans-unit.target: `Click`双击控件每次引发事件。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you have event handlers for the `Click` and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick> events of a [control](ms-help://MS.VSCC.v90/MS.MSDNQTR.v90.en/fxref_system.windows.forms/html/6569d671-0a28-7b3f-dbb8-90c3d272b6e2.htm), the `Click` and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick> events are raised when the control is double-clicked and both methods are called.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你有事件处理程序`Click`和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick>的事件[控件](ms-help://MS.VSCC.v90/MS.MSDNQTR.v90.en/fxref_system.windows.forms/html/6569d671-0a28-7b3f-dbb8-90c3d272b6e2.htm)、`Click`和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick>时控件是双击和调用这两种方法将引发事件。

trans-unit.source: If a control is double-clicked and that control does not support the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick> event, the `Click` event might be raised two times.
trans-unit.target: 如果双击控件时，控件不支持<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick>事件，`Click`可能引发事件两次。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to handle events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic.
trans-unit.target: 函数和对象在<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6>命名空间提供用于连接通过从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 Visual Basic 的工具。

trans-unit.source: In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 大多数情况下，这些函数和对象可再现 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中其他命名空间的功能。

trans-unit.source: They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.
trans-unit.target: 只有 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 实现有显著区别时才需要这些函数和对象。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a visual aspect of an owner-drawn <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem" /> changes.
trans-unit.target: 在所有者绘制的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem" /> 的可视方位更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: This event is used by an owner-drawn <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>.
trans-unit.target: 此事件由一个所有者绘制<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to handle events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.target: 函数和对象在<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6>命名空间提供用于连接通过从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 Visual Basic 的工具。

trans-unit.target: 大多数情况下，这些函数和对象可再现 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中其他命名空间的功能。

trans-unit.source: They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.
trans-unit.target: 只有 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 实现有显著区别时才需要这些函数和对象。

trans-unit.source: Overrides <see cref="M:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseControlArray.GetControlInstanceType" />.
trans-unit.target: 重写 <see cref="M:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseControlArray.GetControlInstanceType" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MenuItemArray" /> class is the base class for all control arrays that are used in applications upgraded from Visual Basic 6.0.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MenuItemArray" /> 类是从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级的应用程序中所使用的所有控件数组的基类。

trans-unit.source: Because this class is not typically used to create an instance of the class, this <see langword="Protected" /> method is usually not called directly but is instead called by a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 因为该类通常不用于创建类的实例，所以，通常不直接调用此 <see langword="Protected" /> 方法，而是通过派生类调用。

trans-unit.source: This method cannot be called from your application's code.
trans-unit.target: 无法从你的应用程序代码调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Object.GetType%2A> method instead.
trans-unit.target: 请改用 <xref:System.Object.GetType%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic.
trans-unit.target: 函数和对象在<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6>命名空间提供用于连接通过从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 Visual Basic 的工具。

trans-unit.target: 只有 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 实现有显著区别时才需要这些函数和对象。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem" /> in the control array.
trans-unit.target: 控件数组中的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the index of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem" /> in a <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MenuItemArray" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem" /> 中的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MenuItemArray" /> 的索引。

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="Short" /> that represents the index of the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Short" />，表示指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem" /> 的索引。

trans-unit.source: This method can be used to retrieve the index for the specified <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法可以用于检索指定的索引<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Object" />。

trans-unit.source: Overrides <see cref="M:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseControlArray.HookUpControlEvents(System.Object)" />.
trans-unit.target: 重写 <see cref="M:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseControlArray.HookUpControlEvents(System.Object)" />。

trans-unit.source: This method cannot be called from your application's code.
trans-unit.target: 无法从你的应用程序代码调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: Use `AddHandler` to hook up events for any controls that are added by using the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseControlArray.Load%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 使用`AddHandler`挂接事件通过使用添加任何控件<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseControlArray.Load%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="Short" /> that specifies the position of an element of the control array.
trans-unit.target: 一个指定控件数组元素位置的 <see langword="Short" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a specific element of a <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MenuItemArray" /> by index.
trans-unit.target: 通过索引获取 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MenuItemArray" /> 的特定元素。

trans-unit.source: Read-only.
trans-unit.target: 只读。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem" /> at the specified <paramref name="Index" /> in the control array.
trans-unit.target: 位于控件数组中指定 <paramref name="Index" /> 处的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem" />。

trans-unit.source: The `Item` property is the default property for a control array.
trans-unit.target: `Item`属性是控件数组的默认属性。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the following lines of code are equivalent.
trans-unit.target: 因此，以下代码行是等效的。

trans-unit.source: Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic.

trans-unit.source: Occurs each time an owner-drawn <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem" /> needs to be drawn.
trans-unit.target: 每次需要描述一个所有者描述的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem" /> 时发生。

trans-unit.source: You can create an event handler for this event to specify the size an item is made before it is drawn in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MenuItemArray.DrawItem> event.
trans-unit.target: 你可以创建的事件处理程序以指定绘制之前进行一项的大小此事件<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MenuItemArray.DrawItem>事件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to handle events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.target: 只有 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 实现有显著区别时才需要这些函数和对象。

trans-unit.source: Occurs before a menu item's list of menu items is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 在显示菜单项的菜单项列表之前发生。

trans-unit.source: This event occurs only when a menu item has submenu items to display.
trans-unit.target: 仅当菜单项具有子菜单项以显示时，将发生此事件。

trans-unit.source: You can use this event handler to add, remove, enable, disable, check, or uncheck menu items based on the state of your application before they are displayed.
trans-unit.target: 此事件处理程序可用于添加、 删除、 启用、 禁用、 检查，或取消选中基于你的应用程序的状态之前所显示的菜单项。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to handle events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic.
trans-unit.target: 函数和对象在<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6>命名空间提供用于连接通过从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 Visual Basic 的工具。

trans-unit.source: In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 大多数情况下，这些函数和对象可再现 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中其他命名空间的功能。

trans-unit.source: They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.
trans-unit.target: 只有 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 实现有显著区别时才需要这些函数和对象。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="ResetIndex" /> method is not supported in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MenuItemArray" /> class.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MenuItemArray" /> 类不支持 <see langword="ResetIndex" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: This method is not supported, and calling it does not raise an exception.
trans-unit.target: 不支持此方法，并调用它不会引发异常。

trans-unit.source: Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic.
trans-unit.target: 函数和对象在<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6>命名空间提供用于连接通过从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 Visual Basic 的工具。

trans-unit.source: In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 大多数情况下，这些函数和对象可再现 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中其他命名空间的功能。

trans-unit.source: They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.
trans-unit.target: 只有 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 实现有显著区别时才需要这些函数和对象。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user rests the mouse pointer over a menu item.
trans-unit.target: 当用户将鼠标指针停放在菜单项上时发生。

trans-unit.source: This event is typically raised when the user rests the mouse pointer over the menu item.
trans-unit.target: 通常，用户将鼠标指针停留在菜单项时，将引发此事件。

trans-unit.source: The event can also be raised when the user highlights a menu item by using the keyboard to scroll to the menu item with the arrow keys.
trans-unit.target: 用户通过使用键盘向下滚动到的菜单项使用箭头键突出显示菜单项时，也可以引发该事件。

trans-unit.source: You can use this event to display a detailed Help string pertaining to this menu item in an application's status bar.
trans-unit.target: 此事件可用于显示有关应用程序的状态栏中该菜单项的详细的帮助字符串。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to handle events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic.
trans-unit.target: 函数和对象在<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6>命名空间提供用于连接通过从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 Visual Basic 的工具。

trans-unit.source: In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 大多数情况下，这些函数和对象可再现 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中其他命名空间的功能。

trans-unit.source: They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.
trans-unit.target: 只有 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 实现有显著区别时才需要这些函数和对象。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem" /> in the control array.
trans-unit.target: 控件数组中的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="Short" /> that represents the index of the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Short" />，表示指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem" /> 的索引。

trans-unit.source: Sets the index of the initial <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem" /> in a <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MenuItemArray" />.
trans-unit.target: 设置 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem" /> 中的初始 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MenuItemArray" /> 的索引。

trans-unit.source: The `SetIndex` method should only be called when you are creating the initial element in the control array.
trans-unit.target: `SetIndex`控件数组中创建的初始元素时，仅应调用方法。

trans-unit.source: To add subsequent elements, call the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseControlArray.Load%2A> method and specify the `Index`.
trans-unit.target: 若要添加后续元素，调用<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseControlArray.Load%2A>方法并指定`Index`。

trans-unit.source: Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic.
trans-unit.target: 函数和对象在<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6>命名空间提供用于连接通过从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 Visual Basic 的工具。

trans-unit.source: In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 大多数情况下，这些函数和对象可再现 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中其他命名空间的功能。

trans-unit.source: They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.
trans-unit.target: 只有 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 实现有显著区别时才需要这些函数和对象。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem" /> in the control array.
trans-unit.target: 控件数组中的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem" /> is a member of this <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MenuItemArray" />.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个值，该值指示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem" /> 是否为此 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MenuItemArray" /> 的成员。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="o" /> is a member of this control array; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="o" /> 是此控件数组的一个成员，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If the specified <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> is a member of a different <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MenuItemArray>, `ShouldSerializeIndex` returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> 是另一个 <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MenuItemArray> 的成员，`ShouldSerializeIndex` 则返回 `false`。

trans-unit.source: Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic.
trans-unit.target: 函数和对象在<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6>命名空间提供用于连接通过从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 Visual Basic 的工具。

trans-unit.source: In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 大多数情况下，这些函数和对象可再现 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中其他命名空间的功能。

trans-unit.source: They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.
trans-unit.target: 只有 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 实现有显著区别时才需要这些函数和对象。
